00019 #ifndef COBASE_UINT128_H
00020 #define COBASE_UINT128_H
00021 
00022 #include <co/base/stdExt.h>
00023 #include <sstream>
00024 
00025 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00026 // Don't include <co/base/types.h> to be minimally intrusive for apps
00027 // using uint128_t
00028 #  include <basetsd.h>
00029 typedef UINT64     uint64_t;
00030 #else
00031 #  include <stdint.h>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 namespace co
00035 {
00036 namespace base
00037 {
00039     class uint128_t
00040     {
00041     public:
00046         uint128_t( const uint64_t low_ = 0 ) 
00047             : _high( 0 ), _low( low_ ) {}
00048 
00053         uint128_t( const uint64_t high_, const uint64_t low_ ) 
00054             : _high( high_ ), _low( low_ ) {}
00055 
00057         uint128_t& operator = ( const uint128_t& rhs )
00058             {
00059                 _high = rhs._high;
00060                 _low = rhs._low;
00061                 return *this;
00062             }
00063 
00068         bool operator == ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00069             { return _high == rhs._high && _low == rhs._low; }
00070 
00075         bool operator != ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00076             { return _high != rhs._high || _low != rhs._low; }
00077 
00082         bool operator < ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00083             { 
00084                 if( _high < rhs._high )
00085                     return true;
00086                 if( _high > rhs._high )
00087                     return false;
00088                 return _low < rhs._low; 
00089             }
00090 
00095         bool operator > ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00096             { 
00097                 if( _high > rhs._high )
00098                     return true;
00099                 if( _high < rhs._high )
00100                     return false;
00101                 return _low > rhs._low; 
00102             }
00103 
00109         bool operator <= ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00110             { 
00111                 if( _high < rhs._high )
00112                     return true;
00113                 if( _high > rhs._high )
00114                     return false;
00115                 return _low <= rhs._low; 
00116             }
00117 
00123         bool operator >= ( const uint128_t& rhs ) const
00124             { 
00125                 if( _high > rhs._high )
00126                     return true;
00127                 if( _high < rhs._high )
00128                     return false;
00129                 return _low >= rhs._low; 
00130             }
00131 
00133         uint128_t& operator ++()
00134             { 
00135                 ++_low;
00136                 if( !_low )
00137                     ++_high;
00138                 
00139                 return *this;
00140             }
00141         
00143         uint128_t& operator --()
00144             { 
00145                 if( !_low )
00146                     --_high;
00147                 --_low;
00148                 return *this;
00149             }
00150 
00152         const uint64_t& low() const { return _low; }
00154         const uint64_t& high() const { return _high; }
00155 
00157         uint64_t& low() { return _low; }
00159         uint64_t& high() { return _high; }
00160 
00162         std::string getShortString() const
00163             {
00164                 std::stringstream stream;
00165                 stream << std::hex << _high << _low;
00166                 const std::string str = stream.str();
00167                 return str.substr( 0, 3 ) + ".." +
00168                     str.substr( str.length() - 3, std::string::npos );
00169             }
00170     private:
00171         uint64_t _high;
00172         uint64_t _low;
00173     };
00174 
00176     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const uint128_t& id )
00177     {
00178         os << std::hex << id.high() << ':' << id.low() << std::dec;
00179         return os;
00180     }
00181 
00183     inline uint128_t operator+ ( const uint128_t& a, const uint64_t& b ) 
00184     {
00185         uint128_t result = a;
00186         result.low() += b;
00187         if( result.low() < a.low( ))
00188             ++result.high();
00189         return result;
00190     };
00191 
00193     inline uint128_t operator- ( const uint128_t& a, const uint64_t& b ) 
00194     {
00195         uint128_t result = a;
00196         result.low() -= b;
00197         if( result.low() > a.low( ))
00198             --result.high();
00199         return result;
00200     };
00201 
00202 }
00203 }

00205 #ifdef EQ_STDEXT_VC8

00207 template<> inline size_t stde::hash_compare< co::base::uint128_t >::operator() 
00208         ( const co::base::uint128_t& key ) const
00209 {
00210     return key.high() ^ key.low();
00211 }
00212 
00213 template<> inline size_t stde::hash_value( const co::base::uint128_t& key )
00214 {
00215     return key.high() ^ key.low();
00216 }

00218 #else // EQ_STDEXT_VC8

00222 {
00223     size_t operator()( const co::base::uint128_t& key ) const
00224         {
00225             return key.high() ^ key.low();
00226         }
